Class GameWindowController

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class GameWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    Game Window Controller Class This class initializes Number of players, Player model, Game window object and Map HeirarchyModel.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rohit Gupta
